column4: I have Ubuntu set up to open a new terminal whenever I hit the Windows key on my keyboard.  It's nice to be able to open a terminal and tell Linux to just start the program I want, but it seems that I can't do anything with that particular terminal until I'm done with the program I've opened -- which means that if I want to run multiple programs, I wind up with multiple terminals running in the background.
